item.title: Eggs prices are likely to shoot up even more in 2025. Here's why.
item.description: The humble egg is now a source of frustration for millions of shoppers around the U.S, who face soaring prices and shortages. What's going on?

item.title: Ukraine investigates video of possible POW executions by Russian troops
item.description: Ukraine's government says a video circulated on social media appears to show 6 soldiers detained by Russian forces, who "subsequently shot them dead."

item.title: RFK Jr.'s confirmation hearing set for today
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. faces the Senate Finance Committee today in the first of two confirmation hearings.

item.title: 1,500 dolphins captured on stunning video off California coast
item.description: A miles-long cluster of dolphins was filmed leaping and gliding across Carmel Bay, forming an unusual "super pod" of more than 1,500 of the marine cre...

item.title: Customs worker exposed by daughter's social media admits taking bribes
item.description: Omar Ambuila's daughter posted photos of herself carrying designer handbags, taking luxury vacations to Paris and driving a $330,000 Lamborghini.
